org.jerkar.tool

Class JkBuildPlugins

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.tool.JkBuildPlugins

  • public final class JkBuildPlugins
extends java.lang.Object
    Set of plugins configured or activated in a JkBuild.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activate(JkBuildPlugin... plugins)
      Add and activate the specified plugin for the holding build.
      void configure(JkBuildPlugin plugin)
      Add and configure the specified plugin for the holding build.
      <T extends JkBuildPlugin>
      T      		 findInstanceOf(java.lang.Class<T> pluginClass)
      Returns plugin bound to this holder build and extending the specified class.
      java.util.List<JkBuildPlugin> getActives()
      Returns all the activated plugins for the holding plugin.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • activate

        public void activate(JkBuildPlugin... plugins)
        Add and activate the specified plugin for the holding build. Activate means that the plugin will be executed whenever it redefine an extension point.

      • configure

        public void configure(JkBuildPlugin plugin)
        Add and configure the specified plugin for the holding build. Configure means that the plugin will not be executed at extension point. But it is on the specified instance that method may be invoked on.

      • getActives

        public java.util.List<JkBuildPlugin> getActives()
        Returns all the activated plugins for the holding plugin.

      • findInstanceOf

        public <T extends JkBuildPlugin> T findInstanceOf(java.lang.Class<T> pluginClass)
        Returns plugin bound to this holder build and extending the specified class.
